solution_line_template: Next, we will multiply to find the cross-products. {initial_bags} x Y = {initial_time_minutes} x {target_bags} or {initial_bags}Y = {product_of_knowns}.

We want to get figure out Y, so we need to get it by itself by dividing by {initial_bags}, like this: {initial_bags}Y/{initial_bags} = {product_of_knowns}/{initial_bags} or Y = {time_to_rake_8_bags} minutes.
